pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DeltaCATDeltaCAT is a Pythonic Data Catalog powered by Ray.Its data storage model allows you to define and manage fast, scalable,ACID-compliant data catalogs through git-like stage/commit APIs, and has beenused to successfully host exabyte-scale enterprise data lakes.DeltaCAT uses the Ray distributed compute framework together with Apache Arrowfor common table management tasks, including petabyte-scalechange-data-capture, data consistency checks, and table repair.## Getting Started---### Install```pip install deltacat```
